health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussed the vetting of the Nominee for the position of County Secretary and Head of Public Service.
health_data_challenges: Issues of corruption, nepotism, favoritism, and demoralized County Public Service highlighted.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Formulation of Human Resource Policy, Code of Conduct, dialogue with employees and unions, Open Door Policy, and consultations proposed.
health_evidence_base: Records of the vetting proceedings and recommendations.
health_evidence_requested: Requests for memorandums on the suitability of the Nominee for the position.
